citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 AM on
1/25/24.
The inspector arrived at 11:15 AM on 1/25/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone
and learned that both the Licensee and the other individuals authorized to accompany the inspector were at distant off-
site locations and unavailable.
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted. Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with
the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 AM on 
1/25/24. 
 
The inspector arrived at 11:15 AM on 1/25/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone 
and learned that both the Licensee and the other individuals authorized to accompany the inspector were at distant off-
site locations and unavailable.  
 
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted. Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with 
the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
End Section
